doc.title: Killing Frank
doc.plot: Billionaire Frank Reynolds has an auto accident, turning him into a paraplegic who can't talk or move and, indeed, may be brain dead. His family and business associates gather at his mansion to have him declared legally incompetent, so they can divide up his fortune. Only someone else has other ideas, and starts killing them off. Trapped in the mansion, they quickly realize if they don't discover who the killer, they will all become victims.
